item.title: Ola Electric 成为印度最成功的大型 IPO 之一
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日元套利交易数据表明散户投资者谨慎回归
item.description: 有迹象表明，日元的飙升势头正在暂停，日本个人投资者正在缓慢地重返墨西哥比索和土耳其里拉等高收益货币。【原文：Japanese individual investors have been slowly getting back into high-yielding currencies such as the Mexican peso and Turkish lira amid signs the yen’s surge is pausing.】

item.title: 煤矿商 Arch Resources 据称正与 Consol 商谈合并事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Arch Resources 公司即将与 Consol Energy 公司达成合并协议，合并后将成立一家价值 50 亿美元的煤矿公司。【原文：Arch Resources Inc. is nearing an agreement to merge with Consol Energy Inc. in a combination that would create a $5 billion coal mining company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国人民银行回调对人民币的支持，人民币汇率保持稳定
item.description: 中国央行一年多来首次将人民币每日参考汇率设定为大致符合预期，这表明央行正在放松对管理货币的严格控制。【原文：China’s central bank set its daily reference rate for the yuan broadly in line with expectations for the first time in more than a year, a sign it’s loosening its tight grip for the managed currency.】

item.title: 沃尔玛计划退出京东，拖累中国科技股走低
item.description: 一连串与中国消费领域相关的负面消息冲击了在美国交易的同行，导致中国科技股周三早盘大幅下挫。【原文：Chinese tech stocks slumped early Wednesday after a string of negative news related to the country’s consumption space hit peers trading in the US.】

item.title: 债券基金自 2021 年以来首次大举投资亚洲新兴市场
item.description: 亚洲最大的五个新兴债券市场三年来首次共同获得资金净流入，表明投资者对这一资产类别越来越看好。【原文：Five of the largest emerging Asian bond markets are jointly receiving net inflows for the first time in three years, suggesting investors are getting more upbeat on the asset class.】

item.title: 青少年交易 2,000 万美元，为进入花旗集团和野村集团工作做准备
item.description: 在香港的礼堂里，50 位身着连帽衫的人一边操作笔记本电脑，一边喊着公司的名字，管理着他们价值 2000 万美元的投资组合。投影仪上闪烁着股票代码和价格，扬声器里播放着新闻头条。【原文：The Hong Kong auditorium hums with 50 people in hoodies jamming on their laptops, shouting company names as they manage their $20 million portfolios. On an overhead projector, stock tickers and prices flash away, while news headlines blast from speakers.】

item.title: 桑托斯半年利润下降 18%，原因是价格和产量下降
item.description: 澳大利亚天然气巨头桑托斯有限公司（Santos Ltd.）因产量下降和能源价格下跌而陷入困境，上半年基本利润同比下降 18%。【原文：Australian gas major Santos Ltd.’s first-half underlying profit fell 18% from the year before as it struggled with declining production and lower energy prices.】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国石油库存增加，石油止跌回升
item.description: 在一份行业报告显示美国原油库存每周第二次增加后，石油维持了连续三天的跌势。【原文：Oil held a three-day decline after an industry report signaled a second weekly increase in US crude stockpiles.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好花旗集团称利差交易卷土重来，但有所不同。摩根大通放弃削减中国在新兴市场指数中所占份额的提议。欧盟计划对来自中国的特斯拉汽车征收 9% 的关税。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Citigroup says carry trade is back but with a difference. JPMorgan drops proposal to slash China’s share in EM gauge. EU plans to introduce 9% tariff on Teslas coming from China. Here’s what’s moving markets. —Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 菲律宾在线狂潮刺激全球顶级博彩股上涨
item.description: 尽管全球博彩业面临着越来越多的审查，但这支全球最热门的博彩股却在菲律宾国内迎来了在线博彩的强劲需求。【原文：The world’s hottest gambling stock is riding strong demand for online betting at home in the Philippines even as the global industry faces increasing scrutiny.】

item.title: 英国电信称新加坡交易所新增 MUFG 为外汇流动性提供商
item.description: 据《商业时报》周二援引新加坡交易所的消息报道，新加坡交易所已将三菱日联金融集团公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Singapore Exchange Ltd. has added Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. as a liquidity provider to its eFX trading solutions platform for global buy-side institutions, the Business Times reported Tuesday, citing the exchange.】

item.title: 短期投资者抛售股票，坚挺资金留守日本
item.description: 本月早些时候，日本股市经历了多年来最严重的暴跌，当时外国投资者大量抛售期货，但却买入股票现货。在一些人看来，这是一个好迹象，表明较坚挺的资金并未对市场失去信心。【原文：When the Japanese stock market endured its worst selloff in years earlier this month, foreign investors were selling futures heavily but buying cash equities. To some, that is a good sign that stickier money hasn’t lost confidence in the market.】

item.title: 四分之一的英国居民面临冬季停暖：调查
item.description: 据一项全国性慈善机构的调查显示，估计有 25% 的英国居民（相当于 1650 万人）对不断上涨的能源账单忧心忡忡，他们将考虑在今年冬天关闭暖气和热水。【原文：An estimated 25% of UK residents — equivalent to 16.5 million people — are so worried about rising energy bills they will consider turning off their heat and hot water this winter, according to a national charity’s survey.】

item.title: 周三加拿大债务市场可能出现两笔高收益交易
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Chemtrade Logistics 和 Surge Energy 预计最快将于周三发行以卢比计价的债务。【原文：Chemtrade Logistics and Surge Energy are expected to issue loonie-denominated debt as soon as Wednesday, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国股市反弹暂缓，亚洲股市下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街的反弹止步于历史高点附近后，亚洲股市将出现下跌。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to decline after a rally on Wall Street halted within striking distance of its all-time highs.】

item.title: 木星的纳什将购买日元作为最大的货币赌注
item.description: 茱比特资产管理公司（Jupiter Asset Management）的马克-纳什（Mark Nash）加大了日元升值的赌注，因为他认为日本央行有可能在2025年长期加息。【原文：Jupiter Asset Management’s Mark Nash has ramped up wagers for the yen to strengthen on the view that the Bank of Japan is likely to raise interest rates well into 2025.】

item.title: 东南亚太阳能热潮受到中美贸易紧张局势的威胁
item.description: 东南亚太阳能产业蓬勃发展，是继中国之后世界上生产太阳能电池板最多的国家，但由于美国似乎将对该地区征收高额关税，该产业的前景正受到质疑。【原文：The future of Southeast Asia’s booming solar industry, which produces the most panels in the world after China, is being thrown into doubt as the US looks set to impose hefty tariffs on the region.】

item.title: 富国银行聘请道明银行的 Fadi Aboosh 加入金融赞助商集团
item.description: 据知情人士透露，富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. has hired Fadi Aboosh from TD Securities as a managing director in its financial sponsors group focusing on infrastructure funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 房贷利率下降，托尔公司豪宅需求稳健
item.description: 托尔兄弟公司（Toll Brothers Inc.【原文：Toll Brothers Inc. raised its expectations for profit margins for its full fiscal year as lower mortgage rates sparked demand for the company’s luxury homes.】

item.title: 加纳放弃外国可可资助，打破 32 年传统
item.description: 加纳放弃了向国际银行借款为下一季可可作物提供资金的计划，打破了 32 年来赖以建设其农场和经济的传统。【原文：Ghana has ditched plans of borrowing from international banks to fund its cocoa crop in the next season, breaking a 32-year-old tradition that has built its farms and economy.】

item.title: 债券交易员在降息押注上积累了历史水平的风险
item.description: 在美联储四年多来首次降息的预期推动下，国债市场大涨，债券交易商们押上了巨额赌注，承担了创纪录的风险。【原文：Bond traders are taking on a record amount of risk as they bet big on a Treasury market rally fueled by expectations the Federal Reserve will embark on its first interest-rate cut in more than four years.】

item.title: 凯悦酒店将以高达 3.35 亿美元的价格收购标准国际酒店集团
item.description: 凯悦酒店集团（Hyatt Hotels Corp. ）同意收购标准国际酒店集团（Standard International），为其不断壮大的生活方式住宿品牌组合再添新成员，交易价值可能高达 3.35 亿美元。【原文：Hyatt Hotels Corp. agreed to buy Standard International, adding to its growing portfolio of lifestyle lodging brands in a deal that could be valued at as much as $335 million.】

item.title: 芒果市场 DAO 成员投票赞成美国证券交易委员会的和解协议
item.description: 管理 Mango Markets 的加密代币持有者投票通过了与美国证券交易委员会的和解协议，尽管该机构并未指控 DeFi 平台有任何不当行为。【原文：The crypto token holders that manage Mango Markets voted to approve a settlement with the US Securities and Exchange Commission even though the agency hasn’t charged the DeFi platform with any wrongdoing.】

item.title: 新泽西州计划出售 24 亿美元市政债券用于交通修复
item.description: 根据惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）的报告，新泽西州准备出售 24 亿美元的交通基础设施债券。【原文：New Jersey is poised to sell $2.4 billion of bonds for its transportation infrastructure, according to a report from Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 恩桥公司预计 2050 年石油需求强劲，美国石油供应将增长
item.description: Enbridge Inc.首席执行官格雷格-埃贝尔（Greg Ebel）表示，石油需求在未来几十年可能会继续增长，这使该公司的内部假设成为对长期原油使用量较为乐观的预测之一。【原文：Enbridge Inc. Chief Executive Officer Greg Ebel said oil demand may continue to grow in the decades ahead, putting his company’s internal assumptions among the more bullish forecasters of long-term crude usage.】

item.title: 法国看守政府准备明年的稳定预算
item.description: 据总理办公室的一位官员透露，法国看守政府正在为明年编制一份稳定的预算，这将有助于法国实现到2027年将赤字占经济产出的比例缩小到3%以下的目标。【原文：France’s caretaker government is preparing a stable budget for next year that would help the country meet a target to narrow its deficit below 3% of economic output by 2027, according to an official in the prime minister’s office.】

item.title: 加州警察和教师住房抵押贷款风险显现裂缝
item.description: 为资助加州警察、教师和护士的住房而发行的高收益市政债券出现了紧张迹象。【原文：High-yield municipal bonds issued to finance housing for police officers, teachers and nurses in California are showing signs of strain.】

item.title: 在出价未达到 75% 的门槛后，荷兰皇家银行取消了收购 Addiko 银行的计划
item.description: 新卢布尔雅那银行（Nova Ljubljanska banka d.d.）因未能说服足够多的股东投标而取消了收购总部位于维也纳的 Addiko 银行的计划。【原文：Nova Ljubljanska banka d.d. scrapped a plan to buy Vienna-based Addiko Bank after failing to persuade enough shareholders to tender their stock.】

item.title: 美元连跌令欧元和英镑创 2024 年新高
item.description: 美元的下滑推动了其他主要货币的反弹，使欧元和英镑创下了 2024 年的新高，因为交易员们都在关注全球利率的未来走势。【原文：The dollar’s slump is fueling rallies in other major currencies, sending the euro and British pound to fresh 2024 highs as traders home in on the path ahead for global interest rates.】
